page.title: 13The Shops in Maresfield
page.content: Mr and Mrs Flambard own a{Newsagents shop.Three people work there, including a part time person. They sell sweets, matches and cigarettes and stationey, they have owned the shop for 10 years.They open all week,from 6.00a.m.to 5,45pm,on Sundays 6am till 1.oop.m.The small{ {Antiques shop}on the sharp corner opposite the church opens 3 days a week and weekends.The{Estate agents}is 3 doors away from the sweet shop.There was a{general store}in Maresfield near the church, because of bad trade it shut in the summer of{1984.The Haven {Gallery}on the A22 near the Cabin Cafe sells china, glass and gifts.The two people work there have owned it for 18 months.They open Monday to Saturday 9.30 to 5.30 on Wed. half day.The {Post Office}is opposite the closed store.It only deals with P.O affairs.
